name: Smurfen
overview: It is a hard life for the friendly forest dwellers! The Smurfette is lost and a villager needs to go find her and bring her back safely home. The game consists of a long path full of pitfalls and obstacles that you must avoid and overcome only by dodging and jumping. You will meet many animals that you absolutely must not touch, or lose one of your three lives. You will have to move, even in the creepy darkness.
